title: New York Rangers ( NHL ) average ticket price 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 06/07 to 07/08, roughly constant from 07/08 to 10/11, and finally gradually increasing from 10/11 to 14/15.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 10/11 and 11/12.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 77.87 was reached at Year 14/15
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 50.33 was reported at Year 06/07
